description:
Yua is a third-year student at Suimei Academy who seems to be stalking Takumi but later seemingly befriends him. She seems to be quite into anime and manga.
However, this is all later shown to be an act where she is investigating him as she suspects Takumi of being the criminal behind New Gen. Her intention on investigating Takumi is to find out who is responsible for involving her twin-sister, Mia, on the first gen murder, but is later revealed to find out whether Mia kills herself to haunt her.
name: Kusunoki Yua
